title: Water Tower Rehabilitation
description: The elevated storage tank rehabilitation consisting ofabrasive blasting, recoating, code related upgrades, two 15,000-gallontemporary hydropneumatics tanks, and adding two logos. The detailed plans andspecifications from Kimley Horn for Phase III are found in the link underSection 5.

title: Request for Proposals for Federal Compliance Monitoring Services for the State Energy Program: Infrastructure Investment and Jobs Act Energy Efficiency Revolving Loan Fund Program
description: The State Energy Conservation Office (“SECO”)of the Texas Comptroller of Public Accounts (“Comptroller”) issues this Requestfor Proposals No. 240g (the “RFP”) to invite proposals from qualified,independent federal compliance monitoring firms located in the state of Texas toprovide Federal Compliance Monitoring services to SECO’s administration of the StateEnergy Program: Infrastructure Investment and Jobs Act Energy EfficiencyRevolving Loan Fund Program ( SEP IIJA EE RLF ). Potential respondents should specialize in monitoringthe administration of federal programs and should have extensive workingexperience with grant management and program evaluation and auditing.

title: End-User IT Outsourcing Services
description: The objective of this Request for Offer (RFO) is to solicit Responses from potential Respondents to provide End-User IT Outsourcing Services to DIR Customers, acting by and through the Department of Information Resources (DIR). This is a subsequent procurement to DIR-CPO-TMP-442. Potential Respondents should note that requirements and response instructions may not be identical.This solicitation is for services only. The Slide Deck and Attendee List, from the Vendor Market Engagement held on October 14, 2025 at 10AM (CT) are attached to the solicitation package.

title: Residence Lease Big Spring Texas
description: Texas Parks and Wildlife Department (TPWD) is soliciting bids for lease of one (1) residence between 1,500 and 2,000 square feet located within 30 driving miles of Big Spring State Park, in Howard County. TPWD prefers to lease a single-family house but will consider bids for duplex facilities and/or apartments. Awards No awards available.

title: Trash Removal and Disposal Services - El Paso
description: Services to provide trash removal and disposal services for various locations within TxDOT EI Paso District. NOTE: All information or changes related to this solicitation will be posted on this website. Respondents must monitor this website for any addendums, additional documents, questions and answers, or changes. The Response Due Date and Time specified on this posting is the due date and time for submitting responses. Response submittals will not be accepted after this date and time.
